wordGroup: in collusion with 串通；与…勾结

sentences.en: He found no evidence of collusion between record companies and retailers.
sentences.cn: 他找不出唱片公司与零售商互相勾结的证据。

sentences.en: The police were corrupt and were operating in collusion with the drug dealers.
sentences.cn: 警察腐败，与那伙毒品贩子内外勾结。

sentences.en: They were in collusion and swindled people out of their money.
sentences.cn: 他们穿连裆裤， 诈人钱财。
